text: @GovAndyBeshear My Mother-in-Law says thumbs up to @GovAndyBeshear @AndyBeshearKY , for a job well done during this crisis. She is in the Loretto Motherhouse Infirmary in Loretto, KY. We will get through this together. #COVID19 #CoronaLockdown #TeamKentucky https://t.co/ak3KmAfIMT

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
